mapper.insert: insert into sardine_bintype ( uuid, code, name, length, width, height, plotRatio, bearing, createdTime, createdId, createdCode, createdName, lastModifyTime, lastModifyId, lastModifyCode, lastModifyName, version ) values( #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{plotRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bearing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from sardine_bintype t where t.uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update sardine_bintype
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, width = #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, plotRatio = #{plotRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bearing = #{bearing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} + 1,
LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
